00030 ultimix.string_utilities.CompileTags = function( Str )
00031 {
00032       Str = ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace( '[js_rand_0]' , ultimix.GetRandomInt() , Str );
00033       Str = ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace( '[js_rand_1]' , ultimix.GetRandomInt() , Str );
00034       Str = ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace( '[js_rand_2]' , ultimix.GetRandomInt() , Str );
00035       Str = ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace( '[js_rand_3]' , ultimix.GetRandomInt() , Str );

00042 
00043       return( Str );
00044 }

00059 ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace = function( Search , Replace , Subject )
00060 {
00061       return( Subject.split( Search ).join( Replace ) );
00062 }

00075 ultimix.string_utilities.PrintRecord = function( Format , Record )
00076 {
00077       for( i in Record )
00078       {
00079             Format = ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace( '[' + i + ']' , Record[ i ] , Format );
00080       }
00081       
00082       return( Format );
00083 }

00094 ultimix.string_utilities.Base64Encode = function( data )
00095 {   
00096       /* Encodes data with MIME base64
00097      
00098      +   original by: Tyler Akins (http:/ /rumkin.com)
00099      +   improved by: Bayron Guevara */
00100  
00101     var           b64 = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
00102     var           o1 , o2 , o3 , h1 , h2 , h3 , h4 , bits , i = 0 , enc = '';
00103  
00104     do
00105       { 
00106             /* pack three octets into four hexets */
00107         o1 = data.charCodeAt( i++ );
00108         o2 = data.charCodeAt( i++ );
00109         o3 = data.charCodeAt( i++ );
00110  
00111         bits = o1 << 16 | o2 << 8 | o3;
00112  
00113         h1 = bits >> 18 & 0x3f;
00114         h2 = bits >> 12 & 0x3f;
00115         h3 = bits >> 6 & 0x3f;
00116         h4 = bits & 0x3f;
00117  
00118         /* use hexets to index into b64, and append result to encoded string */
00119         enc += b64.charAt( h1 ) + b64.charAt( h2 ) + b64.charAt( h3 ) + b64.charAt( h4 );
00120     }
00121       while ( i < data.length );
00122  
00123     switch( data.length % 3 )
00124       {
00125         case( 1 ):
00126             enc = enc.slice( 0 , -2 ) + '==';
00127         break;
00128         case( 2 ):
00129             enc = enc.slice( 0 , -1 ) + '=';
00130         break;
00131     }
00132  
00133     return( enc );
00134 }

00145 ultimix.string_utilities.Base64Decode = function( data )
00146 {
00147       /* Decodes data encoded with MIME base64
00148        
00149        +   original by: Tyler Akins (http:/ /rumkin.com) */
00150 
00151       var   b64 = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
00152       var   o1 , o2 , o3 , h1 , h2 , h3 , h4 , bits , i = 0 , enc = '';
00153 
00154       do
00155       {
00156             /* unpack four hexets into three octets using index points in b64 */
00157             h1 = b64.indexOf( data.charAt( i++ ) );
00158             h2 = b64.indexOf( data.charAt( i++ ) );
00159             h3 = b64.indexOf( data.charAt( i++ ) );
00160             h4 = b64.indexOf( data.charAt( i++ ) );
00161 
00162             bits = h1<<18 | h2<<12 | h3<<6 | h4;
00163 
00164             o1 = bits>>16 & 0xff;
00165             o2 = bits>>8 & 0xff;
00166             o3 = bits & 0xff;
00167 
00168             if( h3 == 64 )       enc += String.fromCharCode( o1 );
00169             else if ( h4 == 64 ) enc += String.fromCharCode( o1 , o2 );
00170             else                 enc += String.fromCharCode( o1 , o2 , o3 );
00171       }
00172       while( i < data.length );
00173 
00174       return( enc );
00175 }
